title: Cultural Tour
tagline: Immerse yourself in Bhutan's rich cultural heritage
description: Experience the spiritual heart of Bhutan through its ancient monasteries, vibrant festivals, and deeply rooted Buddhist traditions. This carefully crafted journey takes you through the kingdom's most sacred sites while connecting you with local communities and their timeless way of life.

pricing.note: Based on double occupancy. Single supplement available.

highlights: Attend a traditional Bhutanese blessing ceremony
Experience local village life and homestay
Witness sacred mask dances and cultural performances
Hike through pristine pine forests to remote temples

itinerary.title: Arrival in Paro
itinerary.description: Arrive at Paro International Airport and transfer to your hotel. Evening orientation and welcome dinner with traditional Bhutanese cuisine.

itinerary.title: Paro Exploration
itinerary.description: Visit Paro Dzong, one of Bhutan's most impressive fortresses, and explore the National Museum. Afternoon visit to Kyichu Lhakhang, one of the oldest temples in Bhutan.

itinerary.title: Tiger's Nest Monastery Hike
itinerary.description: Embark on the iconic hike to Taktsang Monastery (Tiger's Nest), perched on a cliff 900m above the valley. This spiritual journey takes 4-5 hours round trip with breathtaking views.

itinerary.title: Paro to Thimphu
itinerary.description: Drive to Thimphu, Bhutan's capital. Visit the Memorial Chorten, Buddha Dordenma statue, and explore the weekend market if traveling Friday-Sunday.

itinerary.title: Thimphu Cultural Experience
itinerary.description: Deep dive into Bhutanese culture with visits to traditional arts and crafts schools, papermaking factory, and textile museums. Evening cultural show with mask dances.

itinerary.title: Village Homestay Experience
itinerary.description: Travel to a traditional Bhutanese village for an authentic homestay experience. Participate in daily activities, learn to cook local dishes, and connect with your host family.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Paro Airport for your departure flight, carrying memories of Bhutan's rich cultural heritage.

notIncluded: Tips for guide and driver (optional but appreciated)

bookingInfo.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 30 days before departure. 50% refund 15-30 days before. No refund within 15 days.
bookingInfo.fitnessLevel: Moderate fitness required for hiking activities
